product_name: Zoic Black Market Bike Shorts - Men's
long_description: The Zoic Black Market bike shorts are packed with features at a price that will amaze you. Shorts are ideal for weekend assaults on the trail or zipping around the neighborhood. Perfect for commuting or cruising, the quick drying, lightweight stretch outer shorts endure daily use; gusseted crotch allows unrestricted range of motion. Features removable and moisture-wicking polyester/spandex stretch mesh liner shorts. Built in Zoic Assault ZO-Wick chamois is anatomically molded for comfort and support. Integrated knit mesh panels facilitate cooling airflow between outer and inner shorts. Liner shorts feature a tagless waistline; leg grippers keep liner shorts in place as you move. Zoic Black Market shorts features 2 front hand pockets, twin angled zip pockets on thigh and a rear zippered pocket. Lower back side features a MP3/cell phone pocket with headphone port and cord loop that keeps cord close to body. Dial in the fit with the partially elaticized waistband, adjustable belt and traditional zip fly with snap closure.
